page.title: 12GAME
page.content: The{birds}are bred from estate stock,the{eggs}being collected as soon as they are laid and incubated indoors. At six weeks the{poults}are released into the pens,food is scattered under straw to encourage natural feeding habits. Some 2/3 weeks later the{birds}are released into the open. The gamekeepers control{vermin and{predators.}Forty percent of the {game}reared is shot. There are also{roe}and{fallow deer}in the woods and these are culled by the Sports Manager himself. The{Forestry Commission}act in an advisory capacity and in recent years the estate assisted the{Game {Conservancy}in a research dealing with the{grey partridge}population.
